example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ فَ) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS دَه)) (NP-ADV (NOUN أَكِيد)) (PP-PRD (PREP مِن) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN إِحْساس) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه)) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (DET+NOUN النَقْص)))))) (NP-ADV (ADJP (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (ADJ_COMP أَكْثَر)))))

role.argrole: entity towards or for whom the emotion is
